techmeme.title: OpenAI partners with DoorDash, Instacart, Priceline, StubHub, and Uber to ensure that Operator respects these businesses' terms of service agreements (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)

OpenAI says Operator is powered by Computer-Using Agent, or CUA, which combines GPT-4o's vision capabilities with "reasoning" abilities of more advanced models (Will Douglas Heaven/MIT Technology Review)
OpenAI releases a "research preview" of its Operator AI agent that can automate web-based tasks, launching in the US to subscribers of the $200/month Pro tier (Jay Peters/The Verge)
At Davos, Trump blasts EU for targeting Apple, Google, and Meta, describing regulatory cases as "a form of taxation", and references Apple's €13B Irish tax bill (Bloomberg)
Perplexity launches Perplexity Assistant in its Android app, which can take "multi-app actions" like hailing a ride, initially free for users in 15 languages (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
